title: [Large-Scale] Augmented Reality and Sensor-Based Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of practical experience in the relevant field (aviation maintenance, medical imaging, astronaut training) and basic digital technology proficiency
context.additional_context: Implementing a training environment similar to real-world scenarios by accessing augmented reality content and sensor data via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce specialized work procedures with over 85% accuracy using augmented reality interfaces.
Learners can compare their performance results with expert standards via sensor data analysis and establish improvement plans at least three times.
Learners can identify 90% of errors occurring during training through reflective practice and develop response strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
